title: Online Social Constructivism-Based Microlearning Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of scientific fundamental concepts and experience with online learning
context.additional_context: A non-degree program for working professionals, offering flexible learning environments through mobile devices.

learning_goals: Learners can perform over 80% of collaborative activities with peer learners using purposeful interpersonal interaction (PII) strategies
Learners can write at least three improvement plans incorporating peer feedback during scientific problem-solving processes
Learners participate in at least two structured discussion activities per week through mobile platforms
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
